issue.title: [C++] Add min and max aggregation functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13849](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13849). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have min_max but that returns a struct array. At some point we will want compute kernels that we can call in a ProjectNode that will allow us to get at struct array elements, but for now it would be nice to have (hash_)min and max that just give the scalar we want.
